question_ar: كم عدد سور القرآن الكريم؟
question_en: How many surahs are in the Quran?
explanation_en: The Quran contains 114 surahs.

question_ar: سورة الكوثر هي أقصر سورة في القرآن.
question_en: Surah Al-Kawthar is the shortest surah in the Quran.
explanation_ar: سورة الكوثر تتكون من ثلاث آيات فقط.
explanation_en: Surah Al-Kawthar consists of only three verses.

question_ar: ما هي أطول سورة في القرآن الكريم؟
question_en: What is the longest surah in the Quran?
explanation_ar: سورة البقرة هي أطول سورة في القرآن.
explanation_en: Al-Baqarah is the longest surah in the Quran.

question_ar: سورة التوبة لا تبدأ بالبسملة.
question_en: Surah At-Tawbah does not begin with Bismillah.
explanation_ar: سورة التوبة هي السورة الوحيدة التي لا تبدأ بالبسملة.
explanation_en: Surah At-Tawbah is the only surah without Bismillah at the beginning.

question_ar: كم مرة ذُكر اسم محمد صراحةً في القرآن الكريم؟
question_en: How many times is the name Muhammad mentioned explicitly in the Quran?
explanation_ar: ذُكر اسم محمد صراحةً أربع مرات في القرآن.
explanation_en: The name Muhammad is mentioned explicitly four times in the Quran.

question_ar: من هو صاحب كتاب صحيح البخاري؟
question_en: Who compiled Sahih Al-Bukhari?
explanation_ar: صحيح البخاري من تأليف الإمام محمد بن إسماعيل البخاري.
explanation_en: Sahih Al-Bukhari was compiled by Imam Muhammad ibn Ismail Al-Bukhari.

question_ar: الحديث النبوي هو وحي من الله.
question_en: Prophetic hadith is revelation from Allah.
explanation_ar: الحديث وحي غير متلو، بخلاف القرآن.
explanation_en: Hadith is non-recited revelation, unlike the Quran.

question_ar: ما هو أول حديث في صحيح البخاري؟
question_en: What is the first hadith in Sahih Al-Bukhari?
explanation_ar: أول حديث هو: إنما الأعمال بالنيات.
explanation_en: The first hadith is: Actions are judged by intentions.

question_ar: يجوز الاحتجاج بالحديث الضعيف في الأحكام الشرعية.
question_en: Weak hadith can be used for Islamic legal rulings.
explanation_ar: لا يُحتج بالحديث الضعيف في الأحكام.
explanation_en: Weak hadith is not used for legal rulings.

question_ar: كم عدد الصلوات المفروضة في اليوم والليلة؟
question_en: How many obligatory prayers are there daily?
explanation_en: There are five obligatory prayers.

question_ar: الزكاة فرض على كل مسلم يملك النصاب.
question_en: Zakat is obligatory for every Muslim who owns the nisab.
explanation_ar: الزكاة تجب على من ملك النصاب وحال عليه الحول.
explanation_en: Zakat is obligatory when nisab is reached and a year passes.

question_ar: ما هو نصاب الذهب للزكاة؟
question_en: What is the gold nisab for zakat?
explanation_ar: نصاب الذهب هو 85 جرامًا من الذهب الخالص.
explanation_en: The gold nisab is 85 grams of pure gold.

question_ar: في أي عام وُلد النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم؟
question_en: In which year was Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) born?
explanation_en: The Prophet was born in the Year of the Elephant.

question_ar: هاجر النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم من مكة إلى المدينة.
question_en: The Prophet migrated from Mecca to Medina.
explanation_en: The migration occurred in 622 CE.

question_ar: كم كان عمر النبي عند نزول الوحي؟
question_en: How old was the Prophet when revelation began?
explanation_ar: نزل الوحي على النبي وهو في سن الأربعين.
explanation_en: Revelation began when the Prophet was 40 years old.

question_ar: ما هي قبلة المسلمين؟
question_en: What is the Qibla of Muslims?
explanation_en: The Kaaba is the Qibla of Muslims.

question_ar: رمضان هو الشهر التاسع في التقويم الهجري.
question_en: Ramadan is the ninth month in the Hijri calendar.
explanation_en: Ramadan is the ninth Hijri month.

question_ar: كم عدد أركان الإيمان؟
question_en: How many pillars of faith are there?
explanation_en: There are six pillars of faith.

question_ar: الحج هو الركن الخامس من أركان الإسلام.
question_en: Hajj is the fifth pillar of Islam.
explanation_ar: الحج هو الركن الخامس من أركان الإسلام.
explanation_en: Hajj is the fifth pillar of Islam.

question_ar: ما هو أول مسجد بُني في الإسلام؟
question_en: What was the first mosque built in Islam?
explanation_ar: مسجد قباء هو أول مسجد بُني في الإسلام.
explanation_en: Quba Mosque was the first mosque built in Islam.

question_ar: يوم الجمعة هو أفضل أيام الأسبوع في الإسلام.
question_en: Friday is the best day of the week in Islam.
explanation_en: Friday is the best day of the week.

question_ar: ما هو الشهر الذي فُرض فيه الصيام؟
question_en: In which month was fasting prescribed?
explanation_en: Fasting was prescribed in Ramadan.

question_ar: الصلاة أول ما يُحاسب عليه العبد يوم القيامة.
question_en: Prayer is the first deed a servant is held accountable for on Judgment Day.
explanation_ar: أول ما يُحاسب عليه العبد يوم القيامة الصلاة.
explanation_en: Prayer is the first deed to be judged on the Day of Judgment.

question_ar: كم عدد أركان الإسلام؟
question_en: How many pillars of Islam are there?
explanation_en: There are five pillars of Islam.

question_ar: الصوم ركن من أركان الإسلام.
question_en: Fasting is a pillar of Islam.
explanation_ar: الصوم هو الركن الرابع من أركان الإسلام.
explanation_en: Fasting is the fourth pillar of Islam.

question_ar: سورة النمل تحتوي على بسملتين.
question_en: Surah An-Naml contains two Bismillahs.
explanation_ar: وردت البسملة في بداية السورة وبداخل آية كتاب سليمان.
explanation_en: Bismillah appears at the start and inside Solomon’s letter.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي لا تبدأ بالبسملة؟
question_en: Which surah does not begin with Bismillah?
explanation_ar: سورة التوبة هي السورة الوحيدة التي لا تبدأ بالبسملة.
explanation_en: Surah At-Tawbah does not begin with Bismillah.

question_ar: كم عدد أجزاء القرآن الكريم؟
question_en: How many Juz are in the Quran?
explanation_en: The Quran is divided into 30 Juz.

question_ar: نزل القرآن الكريم على النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم منجّمًا.
question_en: The Quran was revealed gradually to the Prophet.
explanation_en: The Quran was revealed over 23 years.

question_ar: من هو الصحابي الأكثر رواية للحديث؟
question_en: Who is the companion who narrated the most hadith?
explanation_ar: أبو هريرة رضي الله عنه هو أكثر الصحابة رواية للحديث.
explanation_en: Abu Huraira narrated the most hadiths.

question_ar: عدد كتب الحديث الستة هو ستة كتب.
question_en: There are six famous hadith books.
explanation_en: They are known as the Six Books.

question_ar: أي الكتب التالية ليس من الكتب الستة؟
question_en: Which of the following is not one of the Six Books?
explanation_ar: مسند أحمد ليس من الكتب الستة.
explanation_en: Musnad Ahmad is not among the Six Books.

question_ar: الحديث المتواتر يفيد العلم اليقيني.
question_en: Mutawatir hadith provides certain knowledge.
explanation_en: Mutawatir hadith gives definite knowledge.

question_ar: ما هو حكم صيام رمضان؟
question_en: What is the ruling on fasting Ramadan?
explanation_ar: صيام رمضان فرض على كل مسلم بالغ عاقل.
explanation_en: Fasting Ramadan is obligatory.

question_ar: النية شرط لصحة الصيام.
question_en: Intention is required for valid fasting.
explanation_en: Fasting is not valid without intention.

question_ar: كم عدد ركعات صلاة الفجر؟
question_en: How many rakats are in Fajr prayer?
explanation_en: Fajr prayer has two rakats.

question_ar: ما اسم زوجة النبي الأولى؟
question_en: Who was the Prophet’s first wife?
explanation_ar: خديجة بنت خويلد هي زوجته الأولى.
explanation_en: Khadijah bint Khuwaylid was his first wife.

question_ar: تزوج النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم خديجة قبل البعثة.
question_en: The Prophet married Khadijah before prophethood.
explanation_ar: كان عمره 25 سنة حين تزوج خديجة.
explanation_en: He married Khadijah at the age of 25.

question_ar: كم سنة استمرت الدعوة السرية؟
question_en: How long did the secret call to Islam last?
explanation_en: The secret call lasted three years.

question_ar: كم عدد شهور السنة الهجرية؟
question_en: How many months are in the Hijri year?
explanation_en: The Hijri year has 12 months.

question_ar: الإحسان أعلى مراتب الدين.
question_en: Ihsan is the highest level of religion.
explanation_en: The levels are Islam, Iman, and Ihsan.

question_ar: ما هو الركن الأول من أركان الإسلام؟
question_en: What is the first pillar of Islam?
explanation_en: The first pillar is Shahada.

question_ar: الإيمان قول باللسان فقط.
question_en: Faith is only verbal declaration.
explanation_en: Faith includes belief, speech, and actions.

question_ar: كم عدد أركان الإيمان؟
question_en: How many pillars of faith are there?
explanation_en: There are six pillars of faith.

question_ar: الصدقة تطفئ الخطيئة.
question_en: Charity extinguishes sins.
explanation_en: As stated in an authentic hadith.

question_ar: ما هو اليوم الذي خلق الله فيه آدم؟
question_en: On which day was Adam created?
explanation_en: Adam was created on Friday.

question_ar: الأذان يُشرع قبل دخول وقت الصلاة.
question_en: Adhan is called before prayer time begins.
explanation_ar: الأذان يكون بعد دخول وقت الصلاة.
explanation_en: Adhan is called after prayer time begins.

question_ar: كم عدد الصلوات التي لها أذان؟
question_en: How many prayers have adhan?
explanation_en: Adhan is for the five daily prayers.

question_ar: الإقامة تكون بنفس ألفاظ الأذان تمامًا.
question_en: Iqama has the exact same wording as adhan.
explanation_en: Iqama is similar but not identical to adhan.

question_ar: ما هو أفضل الأعمال في الإسلام؟
question_en: What is the best deed in Islam?
explanation_en: The best deed is prayer performed on time.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي تُسمى قلب القرآن؟
question_en: Which surah is called the heart of the Quran?
explanation_en: Surah Yaseen is called the heart of the Quran.

question_ar: سورة الفاتحة تُسمى أم الكتاب.
question_en: Surah Al-Fatiha is called Umm Al-Kitab.
explanation_ar: سورة الفاتحة لها عدة أسماء منها أم الكتاب.
explanation_en: Al-Fatiha is also known as Umm Al-Kitab.

question_ar: كم عدد آيات سورة الفاتحة؟
question_en: How many verses are in Surah Al-Fatiha?
explanation_en: Surah Al-Fatiha has 7 verses.

question_ar: سورة الإخلاص تعدل ثلث القرآن.
question_en: Surah Al-Ikhlas equals one-third of the Quran.
explanation_en: This is stated in an authentic hadith.

question_ar: من هو الصحابي الذي لُقب بترجمان القرآن؟
question_en: Which companion was called the interpreter of the Quran?
explanation_ar: عبد الله بن عباس رضي الله عنه لُقب بترجمان القرآن.
explanation_en: Abdullah ibn Abbas was known as the interpreter of the Quran.

question_ar: الحديث الصحيح يُقبل في العقائد والأحكام.
question_en: Authentic hadith is accepted in creed and rulings.
explanation_ar: الحديث الصحيح يُحتج به في كل أبواب الدين.
explanation_en: Authentic hadith is accepted in all aspects of religion.

question_ar: من هو أول من جمع الحديث تدوينًا؟
question_en: Who was the first to compile hadith in writing?
explanation_ar: أمر عمر بن عبد العزيز بتدوين الحديث رسميًا.
explanation_en: Umar ibn Abdul Aziz ordered the official compilation of hadith.

question_ar: ما هو حكم صلاة الوتر؟
question_en: What is the ruling on Witr prayer?
explanation_ar: صلاة الوتر سنة مؤكدة عند جمهور العلماء.
explanation_en: Witr is a confirmed Sunnah according to most scholars.

question_ar: الطهارة شرط لصحة الصلاة.
question_en: Purification is a condition for valid prayer.
explanation_en: Prayer is invalid without purification.

question_ar: ما هو عدد ركعات صلاة العشاء المفروضة؟
question_en: How many obligatory rakats are in Isha prayer?
explanation_en: Isha prayer has four obligatory rakats.

question_ar: ما اسم والد النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم؟
question_en: What was the name of the Prophet’s father?
explanation_ar: اسم والد النبي هو عبد الله بن عبد المطلب.
explanation_en: The Prophet’s father was Abdullah ibn Abdul Muttalib.

question_ar: توفي والد النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم قبل ولادته.
question_en: The Prophet’s father died before his birth.
explanation_ar: توفي عبد الله قبل ولادة النبي.
explanation_en: Abdullah passed away before the Prophet was born.

question_ar: من هو كافل النبي بعد وفاة جده؟
question_en: Who took care of the Prophet after his grandfather’s death?
explanation_en: His uncle Abu Talib took care of him.

question_ar: كم عدد أيام الأسبوع؟
question_en: How many days are in a week?
explanation_en: A week consists of seven days.

question_ar: الصدق من صفات المؤمن.
question_en: Truthfulness is a trait of a believer.
explanation_ar: الصدق من أعظم الأخلاق في الإسلام.
explanation_en: Truthfulness is one of the greatest virtues in Islam.

question_ar: ما هو اليوم الذي تقوم فيه الساعة؟
question_en: On which day will the Day of Judgment occur?
explanation_en: The Day of Judgment will occur on Friday.

question_ar: الإحسان يكون في العبادة والمعاملة.
question_en: Ihsan applies to worship and dealings.
explanation_ar: الإحسان يشمل عبادة الله وحسن التعامل مع الناس.
explanation_en: Ihsan includes worship and good conduct with people.

question_ar: ما هو أفضل الشهور عند الله؟
question_en: Which month is considered the best by Allah?
explanation_en: Ramadan is the best month.

question_ar: النية محلها القلب.
question_en: Intention is in the heart.
explanation_en: Intention is an act of the heart.

question_ar: ما هو أول ما نزل من القرآن؟
question_en: What was the first revelation of the Quran?
explanation_ar: أول ما نزل هو اقرأ باسم ربك.
explanation_en: The first revelation was Iqra.

question_ar: القرآن نزل باللغة العربية.
question_en: The Quran was revealed in Arabic.
explanation_en: The Quran was revealed in clear Arabic.

question_ar: كم عدد أركان الإسلام؟
question_en: How many pillars of Islam are there?
explanation_en: There are five pillars of Islam.

question_ar: الصلاة تسقط عن المسلم في جميع الأحوال.
question_en: Prayer is waived in all circumstances.
explanation_ar: الصلاة لا تسقط بحال إلا عن فاقد العقل.
explanation_en: Prayer is never waived except for loss of sanity.

question_ar: ما هو أفضل يوم طلعت عليه الشمس؟
question_en: What is the best day on which the sun rises?
explanation_ar: خير يوم طلعت عليه الشمس يوم الجمعة.
explanation_en: The best day is Friday.

question_ar: العمل الصالح يشمل القول والفعل.
question_en: Good deeds include speech and actions.
explanation_en: Good deeds include words and actions.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي نزلت كاملة مرة واحدة؟
question_en: Which surah was revealed completely at once?
explanation_ar: سورة الأنعام نزلت كاملة دفعة واحدة.
explanation_en: Surah Al-An'am was revealed all at once.

question_ar: سورة يوسف نزلت في مكة.
question_en: Surah Yusuf was revealed in Mecca.
explanation_en: Surah Yusuf is a Meccan surah.

question_ar: ما هو عدد آيات سورة البقرة؟
question_en: How many verses are in Surah Al-Baqarah?
explanation_en: Surah Al-Baqarah has 286 verses.

question_ar: من هو أول الخلفاء الراشدين؟
question_en: Who was the first of the Rightly Guided Caliphs?
explanation_ar: أبو بكر الصديق هو أول الخلفاء الراشدين.
explanation_en: Abu Bakr As-Siddiq was the first Rightly Guided Caliph.

question_ar: الأمانة من صفات النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم.
question_en: Trustworthiness was a trait of the Prophet.
explanation_ar: لُقّب النبي قبل البعثة بالصادق الأمين.
explanation_en: The Prophet was known as the truthful and trustworthy.

question_ar: ما حكم صلاة الجماعة للرجال؟
question_en: What is the ruling on congregational prayer for men?
explanation_ar: صلاة الجماعة سنة مؤكدة عند جمهور العلماء.
explanation_en: Congregational prayer is a confirmed Sunnah according to most scholars.

question_ar: الطهارة شرط لصحة الطواف.
question_en: Purification is required for valid tawaf.
explanation_en: Purification is required for tawaf.

question_ar: من هو جد النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم؟
question_en: Who was the grandfather of the Prophet?
explanation_en: The Prophet’s grandfather was Abdul Muttalib.

question_ar: شارك النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم في بناء الكعبة قبل البعثة.
question_en: The Prophet participated in rebuilding the Kaaba before prophethood.
explanation_ar: شارك النبي في وضع الحجر الأسود.
explanation_en: He participated in placing the Black Stone.

question_ar: ما هو الكتاب المقدس للمسلمين؟
question_en: What is the holy book of Muslims?
explanation_en: The Quran is the holy book of Muslims.

question_ar: الصدق يهدي إلى البر.
question_en: Truthfulness leads to righteousness.
explanation_en: As stated in an authentic hadith.

question_ar: ما هي أول صلاة فُرضت على المسلمين؟
question_en: What was the first prayer prescribed to Muslims?
explanation_ar: فُرضت الصلوات الخمس ليلة الإسراء والمعراج.
explanation_en: The five daily prayers were prescribed during Isra and Mi'raj.

question_ar: الصلاة فرضت في مكة قبل الهجرة.
question_en: Prayer was prescribed in Mecca before Hijrah.
explanation_en: Prayer was prescribed during Isra and Mi'raj.

question_ar: كم عدد الصلوات المفروضة؟
question_en: How many obligatory prayers are there?
explanation_en: There are five obligatory prayers.

question_ar: الصلاة عمود الدين.
question_en: Prayer is the pillar of religion.
explanation_en: Prayer is the pillar of religion.

question_ar: ما هو أفضل الأعمال عند الله؟
question_en: What is the most beloved deed to Allah?
explanation_en: The most beloved deed is prayer on time.

question_ar: الإسلام دين السلام.
question_en: Islam is a religion of peace.
explanation_en: Islam promotes peace and justice.

question_ar: كم عدد أركان الإيمان؟
question_en: How many pillars of faith are there?
explanation_en: There are six pillars of faith.

question_ar: الإيمان يزيد وينقص.
question_en: Faith increases and decreases.
explanation_en: Faith increases with obedience and decreases with sin.

question_ar: ما هو الركن الثاني من أركان الإسلام؟
question_en: What is the second pillar of Islam?
explanation_en: The second pillar is prayer.

question_ar: الزكاة فُرضت قبل الصلاة.
question_en: Zakat was prescribed before prayer.
explanation_en: Prayer was prescribed before zakat.

question_ar: ما هي اللغة التي نزل بها القرآن؟
question_en: In which language was the Quran revealed?
explanation_en: The Quran was revealed in Arabic.

question_ar: القرآن محفوظ من التحريف.
question_en: The Quran is preserved from distortion.
explanation_en: Allah guaranteed the preservation of the Quran.

question_ar: ما هو آخر نبي أُرسل إلى البشرية؟
question_en: Who was the last prophet sent to humanity?
explanation_ar: محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم هو خاتم الأنبياء.
explanation_en: Muhammad (PBUH) is the final prophet.

question_ar: بعثة النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم كانت خاتمة للنبوات.
question_en: The mission of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) was the final prophethood.
explanation_ar: النبي محمد هو خاتم الأنبياء والمرسلين.
explanation_en: Prophet Muhammad is the Seal of the Prophets.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي ذُكر فيها اسم نبيين متتاليين في آية واحدة؟
question_en: Which surah mentions two prophets consecutively in one verse?
explanation_ar: في سورة الأنعام ذُكر عدد من الأنبياء متتابعين في آية واحدة.
explanation_en: Surah Al-An'am mentions multiple prophets consecutively in one verse.

question_ar: سورة الحج مكية مدنية معًا.
question_en: Surah Al-Hajj is both Meccan and Medinan.
explanation_ar: سورة الحج نزلت بعض آياتها في مكة وبعضها في المدينة.
explanation_en: Surah Al-Hajj contains both Meccan and Medinan verses.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي ختمت باسم نبي؟
question_en: Which surah ends with the name of a prophet?
explanation_ar: سورة الأعلى ختمت بذكر إبراهيم عليه السلام.
explanation_en: Surah Al-A'la ends with the mention of Prophet Ibrahim.

question_ar: من هو الصحابي الذي روى الحديث المشهور "الحلال بيّن والحرام بيّن"؟
question_en: Which companion narrated the hadith 'The lawful is clear and the unlawful is clear'?
explanation_ar: الحديث رواه النعمان بن بشير رضي الله عنه.
explanation_en: The hadith was narrated by An-Nu'man ibn Bashir.

question_ar: كل حديث في صحيح البخاري متصل السند.
question_en: Every hadith in Sahih Al-Bukhari has a connected chain.
explanation_ar: اشترط الإمام البخاري اتصال السند في صحيحه.
explanation_en: Imam Al-Bukhari required continuous chains in his collection.

question_ar: ما هو أقل مقدار للطمأنينة في الركوع؟
question_en: What is the minimum requirement for tranquility in bowing (ruku')?
explanation_ar: الطمأنينة هي استقرار الأعضاء ولو لحظة.
explanation_en: Tranquility means stability of limbs even briefly.

question_ar: تجب الزكاة في الذهب المستعمل عند جمهور الفقهاء.
question_en: Zakat is obligatory on used gold according to the majority of scholars.
explanation_ar: جمهور العلماء يرون وجوب الزكاة في الذهب المستعمل.
explanation_en: The majority of scholars hold zakat is due on used gold.

question_ar: كم كان عمر النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم عند وفاة أمه؟
question_en: How old was the Prophet when his mother passed away?
explanation_ar: توفيت آمنة بنت وهب والنبي عمره ست سنوات.
explanation_en: Amina bint Wahb passed away when the Prophet was six years old.

question_ar: شهد النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم حرب الفجار.
question_en: The Prophet participated in the Battle of Al-Fijar.
explanation_en: He witnessed it while young before prophethood.

question_ar: ما هو العمل الذي يعدل أجر الحج والعمرة التامتين؟
question_en: Which deed equals the reward of a complete Hajj and Umrah?
options_ar: ذكر الله بعد الفجر حتى الشروق
explanation_ar: ورد في الحديث أن الجلوس للذكر بعد الفجر حتى الشروق يعدل حج وعمرة.
explanation_en: Mentioning Allah after Fajr until sunrise equals Hajj and Umrah.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي سُميت باسم قبيلة؟
question_en: Which surah is named after a tribe?
explanation_ar: سورة قريش سميت باسم قبيلة قريش.
explanation_en: Surah Quraysh is named after the Quraysh tribe.

question_ar: الحديث المشهور أقوى من الحديث العزيز.
question_en: Mashhur hadith is stronger than Aziz hadith.
explanation_ar: العزيز أقوى من المشهور من حيث عدد الرواة.
explanation_en: Aziz hadith is stronger in narrator count.

question_ar: ما حكم الصلاة خلف الإمام الفاسق؟
question_en: What is the ruling on praying behind an immoral imam?
explanation_ar: الصلاة صحيحة مع الكراهة عند جمهور العلماء.
explanation_en: Prayer is valid but disliked according to most scholars.

question_ar: كم عدد أبناء النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم الذكور؟
question_en: How many sons did the Prophet have?
explanation_en: He had Al-Qasim and Abdullah.

question_ar: أول من يُقضى بينهم يوم القيامة هم أهل الدماء.
question_en: The first to be judged on Judgment Day are cases of bloodshed.
explanation_en: As stated in an authentic hadith.

question_ar: ما هي السورة التي بدأت بالقسم بخمسة أشياء؟
question_en: Which surah begins with an oath by five things?
explanation_en: Surah Ash-Shams begins with five oaths.

question_ar: من هو الصحابي الذي كُني بأبي عبد الرحمن؟
question_en: Which companion was known as Abu Abdur-Rahman?
explanation_ar: كنية عبد الله بن مسعود أبو عبد الرحمن.
explanation_en: Abdullah ibn Mas'ud was known as Abu Abdur-Rahman.

question_ar: الوتر واجب عند الحنفية.
question_en: Witr prayer is obligatory according to Hanafis.
explanation_en: Hanafis consider Witr obligatory.

question_ar: كم سنة عاش النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم في مكة بعد البعثة؟
question_en: How many years did the Prophet live in Mecca after prophethood?
explanation_ar: مكث في مكة 13 سنة بعد البعثة.
explanation_en: He stayed in Mecca for 13 years after prophethood.

question_ar: ما هو أكثر عمل يدخل الناس الجنة؟
question_en: What deed admits most people into Paradise?
explanation_en: Taqwa and good character.

question_ar: سورة الرحمن تُسمى عروس القرآن.
question_en: Surah Ar-Rahman is called the Bride of the Quran.
explanation_en: It is described so due to its beauty.

question_ar: كم عدد أحاديث الأربعين النووية؟
question_en: How many hadiths are in Al-Arba'in An-Nawawiyyah?
explanation_en: It contains 42 hadiths.

question_ar: ما هو الحد الأدنى لمسافة القصر في الصلاة؟
question_en: What is the minimum distance for shortening prayers?
explanation_en: The distance is approximately 80 km.

question_ar: شهد النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم بيعة الرضوان.
question_en: The Prophet participated in the Pledge of Ridwan.
explanation_en: It occurred under the tree at Hudaybiyyah.

question_ar: أول ما يُحاسب عليه العبد من عمله الصلاة.
question_en: The first deed a servant is judged by is prayer.
explanation_en: This is stated in an authentic hadith.
